body.name: HOMBCK 67” White Desk with 3 Drawers and Storage, Reversible White Office Desk Computer Desk with Power Outlet and Monitor Stand, Home Office Desk with LED Strips for Bedroom
deliveryMessages: $29.99 delivery February 22 - 26. Order within 6 hrs 20 mins.
features: 🌟 Clean lines and broad surfaces pair with the metal round frame to create a modern minimalistic feel. 3 roomy drawers and 67 INCH open shelves give you more surface area to work with. 🌟

【Expand Your Workspace】- 67 INCH open shelves offers dual display and storage space, 19.3"x14.4" space for printer, and also features 3 spacious drawers. That way, you have full use of the 47 INCH desktop and don't have to hunker down to work or worry about bumping into other things!

【Sufficient Leg Room】-Are you tired of feeling uncomfortable and cramped while sitting at your desk for hours on end? It's time to address the elephant in the room. This desk with storage have large leg space enable the user to comfortably utilize both sides of the table.

【White Desk with Power Outlets】- This white office desk with 2 power outlet & 2 USB Ports built-in, provide a charging place for your computer, phone, headphones, and other electronic devices. Solving the problem of long-distance charging, making it easy and convenient.

【Plenty of Storage Space】-Designed to suit all a home office's needs, the office desk with drawers features 3 spacious drawers, long shelves, printer space . Drawer equip with 3-sections fold slides that ensure drawer slides smoothly and silently. This desk with storage is reversible, you can place the cabinet on right side or left side.
【Effortlessly Chic】-Clean lines and broad surfaces pair with the metal round frame to create a modern minimalistic feel. The thicken metal legs equip two foot pads to reduce the scratches to floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars so chic and very practical
reviews.reviewText: i love this desk .it took a couple of hours to assemble but i just wanted to make sure i was taking my sweet time. i love the lights underneath and its honestly everything i wanted. i wish the drawers were bigger though. they are all the same size and a bit small to me but other than that its a good purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars First time purchase with no other reviews.
reviews.reviewText: So I bought a desk without any reviews. That was a really big deal for me but the features seemed to be just right and so did the specs. This will be a long post.I decided to buy this desk because of the storage and the style. I originally wanted an L-shaped desk but learned they take a lot of space. This desk fit perfect.Pros: the desk seems sturdy and very well built. I was able to build the desk by myself and I’m a whole 5 ft tall. It took about 4 hours which was expected and I made sure I had the time to devote to it. It’s not super heavy after fully assembling it, I’m still able to glide the desk across the floor even though it’s quite large. The desk top is very spacious and will work well for days I work from home. I love the option for plugs and usb ports on the top so I don’t have to constantly fumble with a power strip. My printer has a great place to sit on top of the drawers, and that’s my favorite thing about this desk! Cleaning will be a breeze for the top. It was pretty dusty but wiped down well. The openness under the desk is great for cleaning. I just had my flooring installed and I can really sweep and mop below the desk.Cons: the delivery package is VERY heavy because of how many parts are packed in. If I a return needs to be made, the instructions very clearly state the product will need to be in the same package. That would’ve been murder for me but luckily… I like the desk enough I keep it. The leg that connects to the drawer has a small ding. I put this in the back to hide the imperfection. The holes on the left side that connect the desk top to the shelf are not lined up properly so I did end up not using one of the screws. However, this did not compromise its sturdiness because there are three legs and a cross bar. One of the bottom panels for the drawer didn’t line up perfectly. I unscrewed the cam for the arm and found a way make it fit. It’s going to take a while for the glides for the drawers to get used to being used also. It is particle board but the pre-drilled holes did their job minus some chipping.All-in-all, I absolutely love the look and feel of the new desk. The cons are the reason why I gave it 4-stars instead of 5 but thankfully there was a workaround and feel it’s an appropriate rating.When I buy things I look for as close to perfection as I can get and I’ve got no regrets! If any of this changes, whether good or bad, I’ll be back to update my review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Large size for big room. Clean color, classic but nice, Seller is responsibility

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Desk leg was dented or bent from factory
reviews.reviewText: The desk takes a long time to assemble and the one side leg of the desk had a dent or bent in it from the factory. Could not be fixed and to heavy to try to make a return of this product.

reviews.reviewText: Me encanto buen Tamaño y facil de armar
